file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: OpenAPI3 Test
paths:
  /sample/{sample_id}:
    parameters:
      - name: sample_id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
    post:
      description: override here
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                test:
                  type: string
              required:
                - test
      responses:
        '204':
          description: empty
  /ref-sample:
    $ref: '#/paths/~1sample~1%7Bsample_id%7D'
  /ref-sample/relative:
    $ref: 'path-item-ref-relative.yaml#/paths/~1ref-sample~1relative'
